data.actual_result: The Voice Chat bar at the bottom of the phone disappears in full display mode after clicking in the text bot and exiting out
data.expected_result: The Voice Chat bar at the bottom of the phone shouldn't disappear in full display mode after clicking in the text bot and exiting out
data.short_description: The Voice Chat bar disappears in full display mode
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a Voice chat - Enable full display mode (hide your home, tasks, and back button bar) - click in the text box (any server or dm) - Exit out of the text box aka close your keyboard
